009package Automatic_Thresholding;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
013import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
014import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
015import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
016import imagingbook.pub.threshold.BackgroundMode;
017import imagingbook.pub.threshold.adaptive.AdaptiveThresholder;
018import imagingbook.pub.threshold.adaptive.InterpolatingThresholder;
019import imagingbook.pub.threshold.adaptive.InterpolatingThresholder.Parameters;
020
021/**
022 * Demo plugin showing the use of the InterpolatingThresholder class.
023 * @author W. Burger
024 * @version 2013/05/30
025 */
026public class Threshold_Adaptive_Interpolating implements PlugInFilter {
027
028        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
029                return DOES_8G;
030        }
031
032        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
033                ByteProcessor I = (ByteProcessor) ip;
034                Parameters params = new Parameters();
035                if (!setParameters(params))
036                        return;
037                AdaptiveThresholder thr = new InterpolatingThresholder(params);
038                ByteProcessor Q = thr.getThreshold(I);
039                thr.threshold(I, Q);
040        }
041        
042        boolean setParameters(Parameters params) {
043                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
044                gd.addNumericField("tile size", params.tileSize, 0);
045                gd.addCheckbox("bright background", params.bgMode == BackgroundMode.BRIGHT);
046                gd.showDialog();
047                if (gd.wasCanceled()) {
048                        return false;
049                }       
050                params.tileSize = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
051                params.bgMode = (gd.getNextBoolean()) ? BackgroundMode.BRIGHT : BackgroundMode.DARK;
052                return true;
053        }
054}
